name: Seller Widget – App for bol.com
author: Derk Braakman

sections.description:
This widget shows your second hand stuff that you’ve added to bol.com yourself though your seller account on bol.com. It needs your seller-id and a bol.com Open API key to work.

Start promoting your second hand goods from bol.com on your Wordpres site now!

Note

Application Seller Widget is an independent application developed by derkmdt, with the approval of bol.com. The development of the Seller Widget is not initiated, developed or published by bol.com. Any questions regarding this plugin you can ask on the Plugin page on https://wordpress.org/plugins/bolcom-seller-widget/ under Support.

Todo

  • That you can make a selection of your offered items. Now it’s showing all of your products based on a limit you enter in the settings.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the widgets
  4. Add the settings for your Open API key and fill in your bol.com seller account id. Links are shown in the settings screen.
sections.changelog:

1.0.3

  • Fixed changes from bol.com API on 15-10-2013

1.0.2

  • Changed name of Plugin
  • Added banner on WordPress Plugin page

1.0.1

  • Fixed update on bol.com Open API V4
  • added direct links to second hands page on bol.com

1.0

  • Initial release
